meanings.definition: The state or quality of being intentional.
meanings.sent1: Her intentionalities were evident in every decision she made.
meanings.sent2: His intentionalities always led to positive outcomes.
meanings.sent3: The cat's intentionalities in knocking over the vase seemed mischievous.
meanings.sent4: The intentionalities of the waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The artist's intentionalities shone through in every stroke of the brush.

meanings.definition: The actions or behaviors that are done with purpose or deliberation.
meanings.sent1: The team's intentionalities were focused on winning the game.
meanings.sent2: She could see his intentionalities in the way he carefully planned each step.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's intentionalities in gathering nuts were quite efficient.
meanings.sent4: The intentionalities of the bees building their hive were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: His intentionalities in helping others were truly admirable.
